tha-ap548:7.2: anantajinasaṃsari → anantajanasaṃsadi (bj) | anantajanataṃ sudhī (s2, s3) | anantajanataṃsarī (pts1)
tha-ap548:14.4: tayā santhuto → yo tava sāsane (s2, s3)
tha-ap548:15.1: homahaṃ vīra → tādisohaṃ mahāvīra (s2, s3, mr)
tha-ap548:24.2: nikkhamitvā agārato → nikkhanto pabbajitthaso (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap548:26.1: Isivhayaṃ gamitvāna → isivhayaṃ patanaṃ gantvā (s2, s3)
tha-ap548:30.2: maṃ mahāparisāya so → mamāha purisāsabho (s2, s3, pts1)
